ModMetaData.name: DEMO: Configurable regeneration
ModMetaData.author: Turnovus
ModMetaData.description:
Demonstration of ConfigurableRegenUtility class.
Adds the following drugs to demonstrate the effect: -Lucilite: General example of a finished drug. -Pyrosalve: Manual whitelist, global side-effects -Quickfix: Automatic injury whitelist, exhuastible uses, missing part restoration -Sickfix: Automatic injury blacklist, exhuastible uses -Eldercure: Manual whitelist, exhuastible uses
